content: I feel that this is a topic that needs focused attention. I've discussed it in other threads, as have other individuals, but we haven't really dedicated a discussion to the nature of extremism, what it means, where it comes from, and how to combat extremism of EVERY religion from which it arises. What started me off? Well, one of the watchdog groups I follow posted a link to this today: "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P1yaaW37CoM The person who made that video has his head so deep into conspiracy theory that he sounds absolutely bonkers. But you can tell that he believes it. This is a guy who took what USED to be the Christian religion, THEN got swept up in it as a political cultural movement, and THEN adopted a victim complex, and THEN went over the top with conspiracy theories. Clearly, that's not Christianity. That's several steps REMOVED from Christianity. But can we take this as a model of how cults, extremists groups, and even terrorist cells of ANY religion develop? And how much more does it take to push a person like this to become violent? What, as Americans who care about both our country and our faith, can we do to recognize, diffuse, and prevent this sort of extremist attitude from developing and spreading? Please discuss. Feel free to cite examples of modern extremism from any religion. We're not discussing the beliefs of those individual religions - we're discussing how extremism develops, and why extremism is dangerous regardless of from what religion it stems.

title: Defining Extremism

content: Extremism of many sorts does not require religion. All it takes is the creation of a victim class. Here in the U.S, we have any number of victim classes that have developed from the constant litany that for one reason or another you me or any body else is being oppressed by some ambigous "they" who, with a not so diligent search on the net, information can be gathered to prove your point. To prove my point give me a group name, dream one up, the only qualification is that it be real. For instance the international brick layers union. Or the national education association. Within three days I can surf the net and find, enough to convince the average whacko that he indeed is the target of the nefarious group that you name. I did this about a year and a half ago and it took me two days to put together a convincing case that Mothers against drunk driving was a communist cabal formed by the international socialist workers union and the headquarters was in (of all places) Paris France!! It was a real eye opener and once again points to the problem our factioned, hyphenated society has created. By creating false lines of demarcation of screaming factions, instead of AMERICANS, who know some things among us are wrong, and working as a people to right those wrongs. We have become a mentality of insular thinkers, of the me first squeeky wheel mentality and it's down hill from there. Now this phenomena is world wide, because for centuries this has been the way, to defeat and control, populations of nations. The only reason America was so spectacularly successful, even with so many faults, is because when the chips are down we come together as a people. We as a whole believed the dream and now we as a people no longer do! Don't believe me? THINK! Within a month, and from the first day after 9-11, we were at each other's throats again were'nt we? Well over the last years it has reached the point to where the Congress thinks it will get away with the crap they're pulling right now, so refute THAT, if you can! That is a symptom only, we have listened to the media and others and the result is easy to see. We can't conduct and win a war against a ****ant nation of third rate buffoons and now in A Stan, they have strenghtened to the point that a third nation is almost ready to be dragged into the fray. (Pakistan) Who just happens to have nuclear weapons and people crazy enough to use them, from a cultural basis based in death! We are playing with fire and Barry O is talking about increasing pressure on them to conform to our wishes. 85 percent of the people there have come to mistrust us, if not genuinely hate our guts, and we from our paper tiger position, are tweeking their tails!! So there you go, lets create a whole new class of downtrodden and see how easy it is, to identify and then become, monsters!! This message has been edited. Last edited by: tawodi, Sat 21 March 2009 12:53 PM

content: Ya know I didn't watch the video becuase to go to you tube is usually to suffer from serious brain shrink.........this was no exception!! When I saw Bill couldn't get there and that it had been flagged, I figured it might be different.....I was right!! A six by six full of crap!! The guillotine idea comes from the left behind series of books and the one world order of unified givernment led of course by the anti Christ and as such is laughable to anyone with a brain.....there again, a brain is a prerequisite, so to find this on you tube is not unusual as you don't usually find brain food there!!
